Case Title: Association for Democratic Reforms and Another Vs Union of India and Others
Judges: D.Y. CHANDRACHUD,SANJIV KHANNA,BHUSHAN RAMKRISHNA GAVAI,J.B. PARDIWALA,Manoj Misra
Issue for Consideration: Issue for Consideration Matter pertains to the application filed by ECI seeking return of data as before this Court in compliance with the interim order dated 12.04.2019, to enable it to comply with the order of this Court dated 11.04.24 directing ECI to upload the data furnished on its website. Headnotes Elections – Electoral Bonds – Application by ECI seeking return of data
Headnotes: Elections – Electoral Bonds – Application by ECI seeking return of data
